effects.description: Sets a solid color for a duration.

parameters.name: color
parameters.description: The color to display.

effects.description: Fades between two colors over a duration.

parameters.name: color_start
parameters.description: The starting color.

parameters.name: color_end
parameters.description: The ending color.

parameters.name: steps_per_second
parameters.description: Granularity of the fade.

effects.description: Pulses a color on audio beats within a specified time window.

parameters.name: color
parameters.description: The color of the pulse.

parameters.name: beat_source
parameters.description: Source of beats: 'all_beats', 'downbeats', or 'custom_times: [t1, t2,...]' (absolute song times in seconds).

parameters.name: pulse_duration_seconds
parameters.description: Duration of each pulse in seconds.

parameters.name: off_color
parameters.description: Optional: Color to return to after pulse. If null/missing, returns to underlying color. (Conceptual for Roocode, compiler generates 'on' pulses only)

parameters.name: color_on
parameters.description: The 'on' color of the strobe.

parameters.name: color_off
parameters.description: The 'off' color of the strobe.

parameters.name: frequency_hz
parameters.description: Frequency of the strobe in Hz (cycles per second). One cycle includes one 'on' and one 'off' period.

parameters.name: on_duration_seconds
parameters.description: Explicit duration for the 'on' color part of the strobe cycle.

parameters.name: off_duration_seconds
parameters.description: Explicit duration for the 'off' color part of the strobe cycle.

effects.description: Applies color themes to audio sections, with optional energy mapping.

parameters.name: section_themes
parameters.description: List of theme definitions. Each item: {'section_label': 'str', 'base_color': ColorObject, 'energy_mapping': 'brightness|saturation|none'}

parameters.name: default_color_theme
parameters.description: Default color theme for sections not explicitly themed.

effects.description: Quickly changes from a pre-base color to a target color, then smoothly fades back to a post-base color.

parameters.name: pre_base_color
parameters.description: The starting color before the flash.

parameters.name: target_color
parameters.description: The color to flash to.

parameters.name: post_base_color
parameters.description: The color to fade back to after the flash.

parameters.name: fade_out_duration
parameters.description: Duration of the fade-out in seconds.

parameters.name: steps_per_second
parameters.description: Granularity of the fade-out.

cli_tools.name: extract_audio_features
cli_tools.description: Extracts specified features (beats, sections, etc.) from an audio file into JSON.

cli_tools.name: compile_designer_json
cli_tools.description: Compiles a .seqdesign.json file to a .prg.json file.
